title: MacOS Portfolio UI (React + Tailwind)
description: A macOS-inspired portfolio interface with dock, draggable windows, smooth animations, and responsive layout. Built to feel like a real desktop experience inside the browser.

title: Terminal GitHub Explorer
description: A terminal-style GitHub projects viewer that lists repositories like a CLI. Supports commands like help, ls, open, clear, and shows project details with repo + demo links.

title: Task Manager Dashboard
description: A clean task manager dashboard with create/update/delete tasks, filters, and local storage persistence. Designed with a product-style UI and smooth micro-interactions.

title: Weather App (Modern UI)
description: A modern weather app with real-time search, temperature details, and clean UI cards. Includes loading states, error handling, and mobile-first responsive design.

title: Job Tracker (Frontend Projects + Applications)
description: A job application tracker to manage applied jobs, status updates, notes, and links. Includes search, filters, and a clean UI built for productivity and portfolio showcase.
